all_text_timv: Investment in the Community coalmining and iron and steel industries. Investment in the Community coalmining and iron and steel industries / European Coal and Steel Community, the High Authority = Investitionen in den Kohle- und Stahlindustrien der Gemeinschaft / Europäische Gemeinschaft für Kohle und Stahl, Hohe Behörde = Investissements dans les industries du charbon et de l'acier de la Communauté / Communauté européenne du charbon et de l'acier, Haute Autorité. Investitionen in den Kohle- und Stahlindustrien der Gemeinschaft Investissements dans les industries du charbon et de l'acier de la Communauté EGKS Investitionen <1986->1999 ECSC investments <1986->1999 CECA investissements <1986->1999 ECSC investment <1973-> [English ed.]. Luxemburg : Publications Dept. of the European Communities v. : ill. ; 30 cm. Annual Ceased in 1999. Issues for <1986>-1999 also have title in German and French. English, French, and German. Also published in separate Dutch, French, German and Italian editions -1984. Issues for <1986-> also available in the following language combinations: Spanish, Italian, Portugese; and: Danish, Greek, Dutch. Issued by: European Coal and Steel Community, High Authority, <1959>-1967; European Coal and Steel Community, Commission, 1968-<1975> Summary report of the investment surveys published separately. Description based on: 1960. Latest issue consulted: 1999. Steel industry and trade European Economic Community countries Finance Statistics Periodicals.
